Submenu Expand Button Start Planning - Wedding Wedding Venues Wedding Catering Menus Wedding FAQ Careers FAQ Blog Contact Your Privacy Choices Previous A Beach With Buildings And Trees Next Scroll to Explore Reservations Destination: Arrival 00/00/00 Depart 00/00/00 Previous month Next month Cities/Region Recent Searches Adults Decrease 0 1 Increase Children Decrease 0 0 Increase Rooms Decrease 0 1 Increase Promo Code Enter Code: Enter Code: Enter Code: Enter Agent ID Enter Agent ID Add Code Booking Close Button Reservations Dates: Previous month Next month Booking Check-in: Booking Check-out: Rooms: 1 Room 2 Rooms 3 Rooms 4 Rooms 5 Rooms Guests: 1 Guest 2 Guests 3 Guests 4 Guests 5 Guests Promo Code Enter Promo Code: Enter Group Code: Enter Code: Submit Promo Codes Add Code Find Reservation Escape to Paradise at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort Best Beach Resort in Hollywood, Florida Escape to Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort-one of the top Hollywood Florida hotels for relaxation and adventure. Discover new adventures, celebrate with friends and family, or indulge in a relaxing getaway at this iconic resort, nestled between the Atlantic Ocean and Intracoastal Waterway. Enjoy beachfront entertainment, spacious accommodations, and unparalleled coastal luxury. Our 369 guest rooms offer waterfront views that invite you to unwind from the everyday and simply chill. Exclusive Offers Previous Slide 10th Year Anniver... BOOK NOW Learn More Keep the Party Going BOOK NOW Learn More Florida & Georgia... BOOK NOW Learn More Family Paradise E... BOOK NOW Learn More Pre & Post Cruise... BOOK NOW Learn More AAA Member Offer BOOK NOW Learn More First Responders,... BOOK NOW Learn More Pay Now, Save More BOOK NOW Learn More Next Slide JWB Prime Steak and Seafood JWB​ offers a fresh take on fine dining with fresh seafood, a premium raw bar, and prime cuts of meat, all paired with world-class wines and hand-crafted cocktails. Learn more about JWB Prime Steak and Seafood Learn More LandShark​ Bar & Grill Inspired by beach bars along the Atlantic Coast, LandShark Bar & Grill offers delicious seafood, drinks, and fun with ocean views. It’s the ideal spot for a casual meal and relaxation at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort. Learn more about LandShark​ Bar & Grill Learn More Margaritaville​ Restaurant Raise a glass and indulge in Florida flavors at Margaritaville Restaurant. Enjoy signature Margaritaville dishes, live music, and a wide selection of tropical cocktails. Whether you’re craving fresh seafood or classic island fare, our restaurant offers something for every guest. Learn more about Margaritaville​ Restaurant Learn More 5 o'Clock Somewhere​ Bar & Grill At 5 o'Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill, experience the perfect blend of tasty bar bites and refreshing tropical drinks. Located dockside, this rustic bar offers live entertainment and is the ideal spot to unwind and relax by the beach. Learn more about 5 o'Clock Somewhere​ Bar & Grill Learn More Lone Palm Beach Bar​ For a tropical drink and casual vibe, head to Lone Palm Beach Bar. Located near the pool or by the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk, this tiki bar serves refreshing cocktails, making it a perfect choice for guests who want to chill by the water. Learn more about Lone Palm Beach Bar​ Learn More Floridays Sip margaritas at Floridays, a laid-back beachside cantina serving refreshing drinks and signature cocktails, perfect for enjoying the Florida sunshine. Learn more about Floridays Learn More Margaritaville Coffee Shop Start your day with a cup of Margaritaville’s signature gourmet coffee at our on-site coffee shop, serving light bites and pastries in a cozy beachside setting. Learn more about Margaritaville Coffee Shop Learn More Drinks & Dining JWB Prime Steak and Seafood LandShark​ Bar & Grill Margaritaville​ Restaurant 5 o'Clock Somewhere​ Bar & Grill Lone Palm Beach Bar​ Floridays Margaritaville Coffee Shop Activities Experience Packages FlowRider St. Somewhere Spa Pool Paradise Couples & Family Photos Kayak & Paddleboarding Jet Ski Rentals Fitness Center & Classes Area Activities Learn More Accommodations Guest Rooms The resort’s rooms and suites combine the classic carefree vibe of the Florida coast with the modern comforts of a luxury hotel. Gaze out across the sparkling Atlantic Ocean or the calming Intracoastal Waterway from your private balcony and relax amid island-inspired decor, upscale tropical furnishings, and signature Margaritaville amenities. Explore the range of accommodations and find the space that suits your stay. Learn More Meetings, Weddings & Special Events Previous Slide Meetings Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is not just a place for relaxation—it’s also an excellent venue for business meetings. Our meeting space offers over 15,000 square feet of flexible space, with options for both indoor and outdoor meetings. After the meeting, unwind at one of our iconic bars or take a stroll along the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk. Groups & Social Events Whether it’s a corporate retreat, a team-building event, or a family gathering, Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort offers ideal venues for your next group event. Our resort is perfect for social gatherings such as receptions, parties, or any event that needs a Florida beachfront venue with a twist of tropical fun. Weddings Is there anything more magical than a beachfront wedding? Celebrate your special day at the most romantic resort in Hollywood, Florida—Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort. From intimate beachfront ceremonies to grand ballroom receptions, our team will ensure your wedding day is as magical as the setting. Next Slide What's Nearby Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is located just minutes from top attractions, shopping, and entertainment in Hollywood, FL. Discover the nearby attractions, including: Zoom In Zoom Out All Points Air & Sea Ports Attractions Convention Centers Shopping Stadiums Stay Connected With Margaritaville There’s always something going on at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort, from exciting events to exclusive deals. Sign up for our newsletter, and you’ll be among the first to know our latest offers and updates. Board Installation & Business Leaders Awards Teacher of the Year Spark Hollywood FL Disaster Preparedness Conference Leadership Hollywood Graduation Gala Grapes for Grades Golf Classic Who We Are About Us Our Team Board of Directors Ambassadors Greater Hollywood Chamber of Commerce’s 100th Birthday Contact Do Business in Hollywood ABOUT HOLLYWOOD From the Mayor Census/Demographics Hollywood’s History City of Hollywood Official Site Community Redevelopment Agency Broward County Public Schools WORK WITH HOLLYWOOD Vendor Guide Business Connections Guide Job Postings & Hiring Guide GHCC Business Alerts VISIT HOLLYWOOD Plan Your Visit Member Directory Member Directory JOIN NOW Select Page Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort Categories Hotels / Motels Restaurant Spa and Wellness Centers Trustee Members 1111 N. Ocean Drive Hollywood FL 33019 (954) 874-4444 (954) 874-4444 (954) 874-2361 http://www.margaritavillehollywoodbeachresort.com/ Hours: 24/7 Driving Directions: https://www.google.com/maps?saddr=%22Johnson+Street+and+A1A,+Hollywood,+FL About Us Destination Paradise Inspired by the lyrics of Jimmy Buffett, the full-service oceanfront resort and entertainment complex offers amenities and services that create the perfect setting to escape the everyday. The resort features incredible waterfront venues including multiple diverse restaurant concepts, a full-service spa, a recreational area with multiple pools, a FlowRider® Double, live entertainment and more. Whatever escape you envision, we are here to take you there! Plan a visit by visiting the website or by calling (954) 874-4444.
